div.h5: Welcome to the AOS 98/Rocky Channels School System! We support the communities and schools of Boothbay Harbor, Boothbay, Edgecomb, Georgetown and Southport Island.

p.em: Superintendent of Schools - Dr. Keith S. Laser, Ed.D.
